text: Dang anquan huo kongbu de xiaoxi daoda tamen de shihou, tamen jiu jiayi chuanbo, jiaruo tamen ba xiaoxi baogao shizhe he tamen zhong zhu shi de ren, namo, tamen zhong neng tuili de ren, biding zhidao dang ruhe yingfu. Jiaruo meiyou zhenzhu suo ci nimen de enhui he ci'en, namo, nimen chu shaoshu ren wai, bi yi shuncong emole.
